word: H6497 - פֶּקַע - peqaʻ - peh'-kah - Knop - மொட்டு

sections.paragraph: a knob - shaped or ball - shaped or gourd - shaped carved wood or a metal ornament
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to burst; only used as an architectural term of an ornament similar to H6498, a semi-globe: - knop.
Cognate: H6497, H6498
